= Introduction =

Emcaster is a reliable multicast library written in c#. It uses Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM) for peer to peer reliable multicast.

= Dependencies =

  * [http://www.microsoft.com/net/default.mspx .NET 2.0]
  * [http://www.microsoft.com/windowsserver2003/technologies/msmq/default.mspx MSMQ 3.0]
  * Windows 2000, Windows 2003, Windows XP

= Example =

{{{
PgmSubscriber receiveSocket = new PgmSubscriber("224.0.0.23", 1234);

socketMonitor = SocketMonitor();

receiveSocket.ReceiveEvent += socketMonitor.OnReceive;

receiveSocket.Start();

PgmPublisher sendSocket = new PgmPublisher("224.0.0.23", 1234);
sendSocket.Start();

sendSocket.Publish(1);
}}}
